subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Dale Earnhardt Jr. took the lead off the final restart with three laps left and completed a season sweep at Pocono Raceway in Long Pond, Pa., by winning the Gobowling.com 400.
snippet: Dale Earnhardt Jr. took the lead off the final restart with three laps left and completed a season sweep at Pocono Raceway in Long Pond, Pa., by winning the Gobowling.com 400.
